title: Get nginx pod's ip created in previous step, use a temp busybox image to wget its '/'
description: Get nginx pod's ip created in previous step, use a temp busybox image to wget its '/'

steps: 1. kubectl get po -o wide # get the IP, will be something like '10.1.1.131'
5. kubectl run busybox --image=busybox --rm -it --restart=Never -- wget -O- $(kubectl get pod nginx -o jsonpath='{.status.podIP}:{.spec.containers[0].ports[0].containerPort}')
